Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2009 06:37AM heather13 wrote: I was diagnosed with dcis type 3 on 5/26/09 -- first surgery was 6/24 -- they actually staked out the tumor under mammo -- dr. is very well respected -- no clean margins. Found 2 stage 1a  tumors. The did not show up on MRI that I had before surgery. Second surgery 7/2 --2 clear margins.  Breast is really deformed -- Radiation Onco actually confinced me to have nipple sparing mastectomy with stacked DIEPs -- plastic surgeon at the Cleveland Clinic got all offended that other doctor made suggest -- had a hissy fit and refused to coordinate his schedule with breast surgeon who is very kind and skilled -- even though he new immediate construction was very important to me.  My breast surgeon referred me to Johns Hopkins -- have an appointment ther on 9/10 for initial meeting with Dr. Flores -- he been discribed has kind and humble but very talented.  I am hoping he is -- I have a little PTSD after plastic surgeon at the clinic.
